commonSrc.query: select CustomerName,sum(InvoiceAmount) invoiceamount from digin_duosoftware_com.ar_invoiceheader as inv inner join digin_duosoftware_com.ar_customerinfo as cus on inv.GUCustID = cus.GUCustID group by inv.GUCustID,CustomerName order by invoiceamount limit 50

select sum(InvoiceAmount) invoiceAmount from digin_duosoftware_com.ar_invoiceheader where year(InvoiceDate) = Year(current_date()) and Month(InvoiceDate) = Month(current_date())-5

SELECT CustomerName ,sum(curentmonth_invoiceamount) as sum_curentmonth_invoiceamount, sum(previousmonth_invoiceamount) as sum_previousmonth_invoiceamount FROM digin_duosoftware_com.compare_customers_view  GROUP BY CustomerName ORDER BY CustomerName

SELECT ProductCode ,sum(currentmonth_invoiceamount) as sum_currentmonth_invoiceamount, sum(previousmonth_invoiceamount) as sum_previousmonth_invoiceamount FROM digin_duosoftware_com.compare_product_view  GROUP BY ProductCode ORDER BY ProductCode
SELECT Date ,sum(previousmonth_sales) as sum_previousmonth_sales, sum(currentmonth_sales) as sum_currentmonth_sales FROM digin_duosoftware_com.sales_comparison  GROUP BY Date ORDER BY Date
